definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: corn, grain, as food stuff (perh. broken, i.e. thresed, Hoffin:ZAW iii (1883), 122 SS Siegf:Ne 10:32; > Kö:ii. 1. 19 n

definitions.title: breaking out
definitions.body: , i.e. sprouting (as chief fruit of soil); hence NH [[שִׁבָּרוֹן]] price of corn);—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Ge 42:1 +; cstr. v:Ge 42:19; sf. [[שִׁבְרָם]] v:Ge 42:26, [[שִׁבְרוֹ]] Ge 44:2;—corn, grain Ge 42:1, Ge 42:2, Ge 42:19, Ge 42:26, Ge 43:2, Ge 44:2, Ge 47:14 (acc. cogn.), Am 8:5 (id.); so perh. (for [[בָּר]]) Ge 42:3 Lag:BN 230; ´[[כָּל־שׁ]]: Ne 10:32 all kinds of grain.
